articles.title: Hong Kong producer Raymond Wong likens Ip Man to America's Iron Man - The Star Online
articles.description: When Donnie Yen went to the US and Europe, people addressed him as Ip Man, says Wong.
articles.content:
Famous Hong Kong artiste Raymond Wong has said he is proud of the Ip Man movies (2008 to 2019) for making it big all the way to the United States and Europe.

articles.title: Monkeypox virus mutations 'challenging' what we know - DW (English)
articles.description: New research suggests that monkeypox is mutating surprisingly fast in Europe and North America. The study shows how little we know about the virus.
articles.content: The monkeypox virus spreading across the US, Europe and the UK is mutating surprisingly fast, according to a study conducted by Portuguese researchers and published in the journal Nature Medicine. Th… [+5296 chars]

articles.description: European governments have been alarmed by a Russian disinformation campaign that seeks to deflect criticism that President Vladimir Putin’s war with Ukraine risks leaving millions of people in Africa facing famine.
articles.content:

articles.author: Erin Prater
articles.title: WHO monkeypox emergency committee to reconvene ‘shortly’ as cases triple in Europe: It’s a ‘fast-moving outbreak that with every hour, day, and week is extending its reach’ - Fortune
articles.description: The World Health Organization's monkeypox emergency committee will "revisit its position shortly" due to the "rapid evolution and emergency nature" of the global outbreak, the organization said Friday, warning that cases in Europe have tripled since mid-June.
